Positive Examples.input: Which sentence is the cause of "The man broke his toe."? Choose one between A and B.  A: He got an infection. B: He washed his hands.
Which sentence is the effect of "The police officer dropped the gun."? Choose one between A and B.  A: The gun recoiled. B: The gun went off.
Which sentence is the cause of "The mother scolded her daughter."? Choose one between A and B.  A: Her daughter burped at the kitchen table. B: Her daughter set the kitchen table.

Instances.input: Which sentence is the cause of "The bartender refused to serve the patron."? Choose one between A and B.  A: The patron was alone. B: The patron was drunk.
Which sentence is the effect of "The girl was angry with her friend."? Choose one between A and B.  A: The girl spread a rumor about her friend. B: The girl told a secret to her friend.
Which sentence is the effect of "The woman shivered as she got out the pool."? Choose one between A and B.  A: She wrapped herself in a towel. B: She poured herself some lemonade.
Which sentence is the cause of "My body cast a shadow over the grass."? Choose one between A and B.  A: The sun was rising. B: The grass was cut.
Which sentence is the effect of "My knees buckled on the stairs."? Choose one between A and B.  A: I caught myself on the railing. B: The railing came loose from the wall.
Which sentence is the effect of "The baby was wailing in his crib."? Choose one between A and B.  A: The mother picked up the baby. B: The baby crawled to the mother.
Which sentence is the cause of "The patient went into a coma."? Choose one between A and B.  A: He suffered emotional trauma. B: His family took him in for medical care.
Which sentence is the cause of "The woman took her family on vacation."? Choose one between A and B.  A: Her husband got laid off. B: She received a salary bonus.
